title: Combined Heat and Power (CHP) Plants
description: An open dataset for Combined Heat and Power (CHP) Plants

sources.name: Mapping and analyses of the current and future (2020 - 2030)  - Work package 2: Assessment of the technologies for the year 2012 heating/cooling fuel deployment (fossil/renewables)
Technology data for Energy Plants - Individual Heating Plants and Energy Transport
Technology Data for Energy Plants for Electricity and District heating generation August 2016
Technology data for Energy Plants - Generation of Electricity and District Heating, Energy Storage and Energy Carrier Generation and Conversion
Catalogue of CHP Technologies
sources.copyright: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency Combined Heat and Power Partnership

fields.name: component_id
fields.description: Identifying numer of component. May repeat due to several occurences of the same component.

fields.description: Name of Combined Heat and Power Technology
